```{r}
design <- "
AB
CC
"


pdf(file = "../../../Output/Paper1_OutputV2/Plots/Time_PatchPlot.pdf",height = 20,width = 20)

  plot_layout(design = design, heights = c(1, 2)) +
  #plot_layout(guides = "collect") +    
  plot_annotation(
  title = 'Time Helps Explain Exposomic Variation',
  tag_levels = "A"
)  &
  theme(plot.tag = element_text(size = 20))
dev.off()
```
